text: Abdus Salam Tarafdar is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Mymensingh-7. ==Career== Tarafdar was elected to parliament from Mymensingh-7 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdus Salam Tarafdar
